name: Copper Ore
reqs: Metal Spirit and no other 'Ore' Traits.
effect: Your Natural Weapons gain _Bane_ [_Wood_]. Gain the _Copper Body_ Armor, which is Equipped in addition to _Metal Spirit_. A Spirit may only have a single Trait with 'Ore' in its name.

name: Heat Conduction
effect: This creature has three states: Heated, Normal, and Chilled. While _Heated_, the creature has _Weakness_ to _Cold_ and _Water_. While _Chilled_, the creature has _Weakness_ to _Fire_. Whenever the creature takes _Fire_ Damage, move them one step towards Heated. Whenever they take _Cold_ Damage, move them one step towards Chilled. If they take _Water_ Damage, move them one step towards Chilled but not beyond Normal.

name: Adept Manifestation
effect: You may _Manifest_ this Spirit as if it was one size smaller.

name: Thin Shell
reqs: Metal, Earth, Wood, or Ice Spirit, and no other [Armored] Traits.

name: Diminutive
effect: Your Spirit becomes _Tiny_, gains a +2 to _Reflex_, and +1 _Movement_. Your Spirit may only select [_Light_] Weapons.

name: Shelled
reqs: Metal, Earth, Wood, or Ice Spirit, and no other [Armored] Traits.

name: Metalborn
effect: Add [_Metal_] to all Attacks with Natural Weapons. Gain the _Metal Body_ Armor and _Metallic Reconstitution_ Ability.

name: Stoneborn
effect: Add [_Earth_] to all Attacks with Natural Weapons. Gain the _Stone Body_ Armor and _Earthen Reconstitution_ Ability.

name: Instinctive Elementalism
effect: Gain _Kinesis_ at _Close_- Range with your Element. Gain the _Elemental Control_ Ability.
